properties.name: suda.xss-attack.check-enabled
properties.description: 是否启用XSS攻击检查，默认不启用.

properties.name: suda.xss-attack.servlet-path-whitelist
properties.description: 配置不需要XSS攻击检查的接口（白名单）.

properties.name: suda.xss-attack.xss-regex-list
properties.description: 配置检查XSS攻击的正则表达式.

properties.name: suda.sql-inject.check-enabled
properties.description: 是否启用SQL注入攻击检查，默认不启用.

properties.name: suda.sql-inject.servlet-path-whitelist
properties.description: 配置不需要SQL注入攻击检查的接口（白名单）.

properties.name: suda.sql-inject.sql-keyword-list
properties.description: 配置检查SQL注入攻击的关键字.
